    {
      "cell_type": "code",
      "source": [
        "from google.colab import files\n",
        "files.upload()"
      ],
      "metadata": {
        "colab": {
          "base_uri": "https://localhost:8080/",
          "height": 201
        },
        "id": "qs8p4KPxYv_O",
        "outputId": "f95c776e-d44c-45ce-83bf-b1fbd0be6a58"
      },
      "execution_count": 5,
      "outputs": [
        {
          "output_type": "display_data",
          "data": {
            "text/plain": [
              "<IPython.core.display.HTML object>"
            ],
            "text/html": [
              "\n",
              "     <input type=\"file\" id=\"files-7c2c7861-94d3-4e81-9246-8daff7eab0e2\" name=\"files[]\" multiple disabled\n",
              "        style=\"border:none\" />\n",
              "     <output id=\"result-7c2c7861-94d3-4e81-9246-8daff7eab0e2\">\n",
              "      Upload widget is only available when the cell has been executed in the\n",
              "      current browser session. Please rerun this cell to enable.\n",
              "      </output>\n",
              "      <script>// Copyright 2017 Google LLC\n",
              "//\n",
              "// Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the \"License\");\n",
              "// you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.\n",
              "// You may obtain a copy of the License at\n",
              "//\n",
              "//      http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0\n",
              "//\n",
              "// Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software\n",
              "// distributed under the License is distributed on an \"AS IS\" BASIS,\n",
              "// WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.\n",
              "// See the License for the specific language governing permissions and\n",
              "// limitations under the License.\n",
              "\n",
              "/**\n",
              " * @fileoverview Helpers for google.colab Python module.\n",
              " */\n",
              "(function(scope) {\n",
              "function span(text, styleAttributes = {}) {\n",
              "  const element = document.createElement('span');\n",
              "  element.textContent = text;\n",
              "  for (const key of Object.keys(styleAttributes)) {\n",
              "    element.style[key] = styleAttributes[key];\n",
              "  }\n",
              "  return element;\n",
              "}\n",
              "\n",
              "// Max number of bytes which will be uploaded at a time.\n",
              "const MAX_PAYLOAD_SIZE = 100 * 1024;\n",
              "\n",
              "function _uploadFiles(inputId, outputId) {\n",
              "  const steps = uploadFilesStep(inputId, outputId);\n",
              "  const outputElement = document.getElementById(outputId);\n",
              "  // Cache steps on the outputElement to make it available for the next call\n",
              "  // to uploadFilesContinue from Python.\n",
              "  outputElement.steps = steps;\n",
              "\n",
              "  return _uploadFilesContinue(outputId);\n",
              "}\n",
              "\n",
              "// This is roughly an async generator (not supported in the browser yet),\n",
              "// where there are multiple asynchronous steps and the Python side is going\n",
              "// to poll for completion of each step.\n",
              "// This uses a Promise to block the python side on completion of each step,\n",
              "// then passes the result of the previous step as the input to the next step.\n",
              "function _uploadFilesContinue(outputId) {\n",
              "  const outputElement = document.getElementById(outputId);\n",
              "  const steps = outputElement.steps;\n",
              "\n",
              "  const next = steps.next(outputElement.lastPromiseValue);\n",
              "  return Promise.resolve(next.value.promise).then((value) => {\n",
              "    // Cache the last promise value to make it available to the next\n",
              "    // step of the generator.\n",
              "    outputElement.lastPromiseValue = value;\n",
              "    return next.value.response;\n",
              "  });\n",
              "}\n",
              "\n",
              "/**\n",
              " * Generator function which is called between each async step of the upload\n",
              " * process.\n",
              " * @param {string} inputId Element ID of the input file picker element.\n",
              " * @param {string} outputId Element ID of the output display.\n",
              " * @return {!Iterable<!Object>} Iterable of next steps.\n",
              " */\n",
              "function* uploadFilesStep(inputId, outputId) {\n",
              "  const inputElement = document.getElementById(inputId);\n",
              "  inputElement.disabled = false;\n",
              "\n",
              "  const outputElement = document.getElementById(outputId);\n",
              "  outputElement.innerHTML = '';\n",
              "\n",
              "  const pickedPromise = new Promise((resolve) => {\n",
              "    inputElement.addEventListener('change', (e) => {\n",
              "      resolve(e.target.files);\n",
              "    });\n",
              "  });\n",
              "\n",
              "  const cancel = document.createElement('button');\n",
              "  inputElement.parentElement.appendChild(cancel);\n",
              "  cancel.textContent = 'Cancel upload';\n",
              "  const cancelPromise = new Promise((resolve) => {\n",
              "    cancel.onclick = () => {\n",
              "      resolve(null);\n",
              "    };\n",
              "  });\n",
              "\n",
              "  // Wait for the user to pick the files.\n",
              "  const files = yield {\n",
              "    promise: Promise.race([pickedPromise, cancelPromise]),\n",
              "    response: {\n",
              "      action: 'starting',\n",
              "    }\n",
              "  };\n",
              "\n",
              "  cancel.remove();\n",
              "\n",
              "  // Disable the input element since further picks are not allowed.\n",
              "  inputElement.disabled = true;\n",
              "\n",
              "  if (!files) {\n",
              "    return {\n",
              "      response: {\n",
              "        action: 'complete',\n",
              "      }\n",
              "    };\n",
              "  }\n",
              "\n",
              "  for (const file of files) {\n",
              "    const li = document.createElement('li');\n",
              "    li.append(span(file.name, {fontWeight: 'bold'}));\n",
              "    li.append(span(\n",
              "        `(${file.type || 'n/a'}) - ${file.size} bytes, ` +\n",
              "        `last modified: ${\n",
              "            file.lastModifiedDate ? file.lastModifiedDate.toLocaleDateString() :\n",
              "                                    'n/a'} - `));\n",
              "    const percent = span('0% done');\n",
              "    li.appendChild(percent);\n",
              "\n",
              "    outputElement.appendChild(li);\n",
              "\n",
              "    const fileDataPromise = new Promise((resolve) => {\n",
              "      const reader = new FileReader();\n",
              "      reader.onload = (e) => {\n",
              "        resolve(e.target.result);\n",
              "      };\n",
              "      reader.readAsArrayBuffer(file);\n",
              "    });\n",
              "    // Wait for the data to be ready.\n",
              "    let fileData = yield {\n",
              "      promise: fileDataPromise,\n",
              "      response: {\n",
              "        action: 'continue',\n",
              "      }\n",
              "    };\n",
              "\n",
              "    // Use a chunked sending to avoid message size limits. See b/62115660.\n",
              "    let position = 0;\n",
              "    do {\n",
              "      const length = Math.min(fileData.byteLength - position, MAX_PAYLOAD_SIZE);\n",
              "      const chunk = new Uint8Array(fileData, position, length);\n",
              "      position += length;\n",
              "\n",
              "      const base64 = btoa(String.fromCharCode.apply(null, chunk));\n",
              "      yield {\n",
              "        response: {\n",
              "          action: 'append',\n",
              "          file: file.name,\n",
              "          data: base64,\n",
              "        },\n",
              "      };\n",
              "\n",
              "      let percentDone = fileData.byteLength === 0 ?\n",
              "          100 :\n",
              "          Math.round((position / fileData.byteLength) * 100);\n",
              "      percent.textContent = `${percentDone}% done`;\n",
              "\n",
              "    } while (position < fileData.byteLength);\n",
              "  }\n",
              "\n",
              "  // All done.\n",
              "  yield {\n",
              "    response: {\n",
              "      action: 'complete',\n",
              "    }\n",
              "  };\n",
              "}\n",
              "\n",
              "scope.google = scope.google || {};\n",
              "scope.google.colab = scope.google.colab || {};\n",
              "scope.google.colab._files = {\n",
              "  _uploadFiles,\n",
              "  _uploadFilesContinue,\n",
              "};\n",
              "})(self);\n",
              "</script> "
            ]
          },
          "metadata": {}
        },
        {
          "output_type": "stream",
          "name": "stdout",
          "text": [
            "Saving sample.txt to sample.txt\n"
          ]
        },
        {
          "output_type": "execute_result",
          "data": {
            "text/plain": [
              "{'sample.txt': b'Title: Introduction to Data Analytics\\r\\n\\r\\nData analytics is the process of examining raw data\\r\\nto extract meaningful insights and support decision-making.\\r\\n\\r\\nTypes of Data Analytics:\\r\\n1. Descriptive Analytics \\xe2\\x80\\x93 What happened?\\r\\n2. Diagnostic Analytics \\xe2\\x80\\x93 Why did it happen?\\r\\n3. Predictive Analytics \\xe2\\x80\\x93 What will happen?\\r\\n4. Prescriptive Analytics \\xe2\\x80\\x93 What should be done?\\r\\n\\r\\nApplications:\\r\\n- Business Intelligence\\r\\n- Healthcare\\r\\n- Finance\\r\\n- Education\\r\\n- Marketing\\r\\n\\r\\nEnd of File.\\r\\n'}"

              "\n",
              "    <script>\n",
              "      const buttonEl =\n",
              "        document.querySelector('#df-2cb2a735-bf8f-4d54-a851-fb6d405f86bb button.colab-df-convert');\n",
              "      buttonEl.style.display =\n",
              "        google.colab.kernel.accessAllowed ? 'block' : 'none';\n",
              "\n",
              "      async function convertToInteractive(key) {\n",
              "        const element = document.querySelector('#df-2cb2a735-bf8f-4d54-a851-fb6d405f86bb');\n",
              "        const dataTable =\n",
              "          await google.colab.kernel.invokeFunction('convertToInteractive',\n",
              "                                                    [key], {});\n",
              "        if (!dataTable) return;\n",
              "\n",
              "        const docLinkHtml = 'Like what you see? Visit the ' +\n",
              "          '<a target=\"_blank\" href=https://colab.research.google.com/notebooks/data_table.ipynb>data table notebook</a>'\n",
              "          + ' to learn more about interactive tables.';\n",
              "        element.innerHTML = '';\n",
              "        dataTable['output_type'] = 'display_data';\n",
              "        await google.colab.output.renderOutput(dataTable, element);\n",
              "        const docLink = document.createElement('div');\n",
              "        docLink.innerHTML = docLinkHtml;\n",
              "        element.appendChild(docLink);\n",
              "      }\n",
              "    </script>\n",
              "  </div>\n",
              "\n",
              "\n",
              "  <div id=\"id_0ef6ccd1-30c3-4e9b-8a34-4ff588bdab0c\">\n",
              "    <style>\n",
              "      .colab-df-generate {\n",
              "        background-color: #E8F0FE;\n",
              "        border: none;\n",
              "        border-radius: 50%;\n",
              "        cursor: pointer;\n",
              "        display: none;\n",
              "        fill: #1967D2;\n",
              "        height: 32px;\n",
              "        padding: 0 0 0 0;\n",
              "        width: 32px;\n",
              "      }\n",

              "        background-color: #E2EBFA;\n",

              "        filter: drop-shadow(0px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3));\n",
              "        fill: #FFFFFF;\n",
              "      }\n",
              "    </style>\n",
              "    <button class=\"colab-df-generate\" onclick=\"generateWithVariable('output')\"\n",
              "            title=\"Generate code using this dataframe.\"\n",
              "            style=\"display:none;\">\n",
              "\n",
              "  <svg xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/2000/svg\" height=\"24px\"viewBox=\"0 0 24 24\"\n",
              "       width=\"24px\">\n",
              "    <path d=\"M7,19H8.4L18.45,9,17,7.55,7,17.6ZM5,21V16.75L18.45,3.32a2,2,0,0,1,2.83,0l1.4,1.43a1.91,1.91,0,0,1,.58,1.4,1.91,1.91,0,0,1-.58,1.4L9.25,21ZM18.45,9,17,7.55Zm-12,3A5.31,5.31,0,0,0,4.9,8.1,5.31,5.31,0,0,0,1,6.5,5.31,5.31,0,0,0,4.9,4.9,5.31,5.31,0,0,0,6.5,1,5.31,5.31,0,0,0,8.1,4.9,5.31,5.31,0,0,0,12,6.5,5.46,5.46,0,0,0,6.5,12Z\"/>\n",
              "  </svg>\n",
              "    </button>\n",
              "    <script>\n",
              "      (() => {\n",
              "      const buttonEl =\n",
              "        document.querySelector('#id_0ef6ccd1-30c3-4e9b-8a34-4ff588bdab0c button.colab-df-generate');\n",

              "        google.colab.kernel.accessAllowed ? 'block' : 'none';\n",
              "\n",

              "      }\n",

              "    </script>\n",

      "cell_type": "code",
      "source": [
        "with open('/content/sample.txt', 'r',encoding ='utf-8') as f:\n",
        "    text=f.read()\n",
        "    print(text)"
      ],
      "metadata": {
        "colab": {

      "outputs": [
        {
          "output_type": "stream",
          "name": "stdout",
          "text": [
            "Title: Introduction to Data Analytics\n",
            "\n",
            "Data analytics is the process of examining raw data\n",
            "to extract meaningful insights and support decision-making.\n",
            "\n",
            "Types of Data Analytics:\n",
            "1. Descriptive Analytics – What happened?\n",
            "2. Diagnostic Analytics – Why did it happen?\n",
            "3. Predictive Analytics – What will happen?\n",
            "4. Prescriptive Analytics – What should be done?\n",
            "\n",
            "Applications:\n",
            "- Business Intelligence\n",
            "- Healthcare\n",
            "- Finance\n",
            "- Education\n",
            "- Marketing\n",
            "\n",
            "End of File.\n",
            "\n"
          ]
        }

    {
      "cell_type": "code",
      "source": [
        "from google.colab import files\n",
        "files.upload()"
      ],
      "metadata": {
        "colab": {
          "base_uri": "https://localhost:8080/",
          "height": 1000
        },
        "id": "_luKCn-8dT9A",
        "outputId": "ca989785-b642-4b34-d108-cba250071b07"
      },
      "execution_count": 12,
      "outputs": [
        {
          "output_type": "display_data",
          "data": {
            "text/plain": [
              "<IPython.core.display.HTML object>"
            ],
            "text/html": [
              "\n",
              "     <input type=\"file\" id=\"files-e48c3310-7368-4195-9478-65340c30a3ab\" name=\"files[]\" multiple disabled\n",
              "        style=\"border:none\" />\n",
              "     <output id=\"result-e48c3310-7368-4195-9478-65340c30a3ab\">\n",
              "      Upload widget is only available when the cell has been executed in the\n",
              "      current browser session. Please rerun this cell to enable.\n",
              "      </output>\n",
              "      <script>// Copyright 2017 Google LLC\n",
              "//\n",
              "// Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the \"License\");\n",
              "// you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.\n",
              "// You may obtain a copy of the License at\n",
              "//\n",
              "//      http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0\n",
              "//\n",
              "// Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software\n",
              "// distributed under the License is distributed on an \"AS IS\" BASIS,\n",
              "// WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.\n",
              "// See the License for the specific language governing permissions and\n",
              "// limitations under the License.\n",
              "\n",
              "/**\n",
              " * @fileoverview Helpers for google.colab Python module.\n",
              " */\n",
              "(function(scope) {\n",
              "function span(text, styleAttributes = {}) {\n",
              "  const element = document.createElement('span');\n",
              "  element.textContent = text;\n",
              "  for (const key of Object.keys(styleAttributes)) {\n",
              "    element.style[key] = styleAttributes[key];\n",
              "  }\n",
              "  return element;\n",
              "}\n",
              "\n",
              "// Max number of bytes which will be uploaded at a time.\n",
              "const MAX_PAYLOAD_SIZE = 100 * 1024;\n",
              "\n",
              "function _uploadFiles(inputId, outputId) {\n",
              "  const steps = uploadFilesStep(inputId, outputId);\n",
              "  const outputElement = document.getElementById(outputId);\n",
              "  // Cache steps on the outputElement to make it available for the next call\n",
              "  // to uploadFilesContinue from Python.\n",
              "  outputElement.steps = steps;\n",
              "\n",
              "  return _uploadFilesContinue(outputId);\n",
              "}\n",
              "\n",
              "// This is roughly an async generator (not supported in the browser yet),\n",
              "// where there are multiple asynchronous steps and the Python side is going\n",
              "// to poll for completion of each step.\n",
              "// This uses a Promise to block the python side on completion of each step,\n",
              "// then passes the result of the previous step as the input to the next step.\n",
              "function _uploadFilesContinue(outputId) {\n",
              "  const outputElement = document.getElementById(outputId);\n",
              "  const steps = outputElement.steps;\n",
              "\n",
              "  const next = steps.next(outputElement.lastPromiseValue);\n",
              "  return Promise.resolve(next.value.promise).then((value) => {\n",
              "    // Cache the last promise value to make it available to the next\n",
              "    // step of the generator.\n",
              "    outputElement.lastPromiseValue = value;\n",
              "    return next.value.response;\n",
              "  });\n",
              "}\n",
              "\n",
              "/**\n",
              " * Generator function which is called between each async step of the upload\n",
              " * process.\n",
              " * @param {string} inputId Element ID of the input file picker element.\n",
              " * @param {string} outputId Element ID of the output display.\n",
              " * @return {!Iterable<!Object>} Iterable of next steps.\n",
              " */\n",
              "function* uploadFilesStep(inputId, outputId) {\n",
              "  const inputElement = document.getElementById(inputId);\n",
              "  inputElement.disabled = false;\n",
              "\n",
              "  const outputElement = document.getElementById(outputId);\n",
              "  outputElement.innerHTML = '';\n",
              "\n",
              "  const pickedPromise = new Promise((resolve) => {\n",
              "    inputElement.addEventListener('change', (e) => {\n",
              "      resolve(e.target.files);\n",
              "    });\n",
              "  });\n",
              "\n",
              "  const cancel = document.createElement('button');\n",
              "  inputElement.parentElement.appendChild(cancel);\n",
              "  cancel.textContent = 'Cancel upload';\n",
              "  const cancelPromise = new Promise((resolve) => {\n",
              "    cancel.onclick = () => {\n",
              "      resolve(null);\n",
              "    };\n",
              "  });\n",
              "\n",
              "  // Wait for the user to pick the files.\n",
              "  const files = yield {\n",
              "    promise: Promise.race([pickedPromise, cancelPromise]),\n",
              "    response: {\n",
              "      action: 'starting',\n",
              "    }\n",
              "  };\n",
              "\n",
              "  cancel.remove();\n",
              "\n",
              "  // Disable the input element since further picks are not allowed.\n",
              "  inputElement.disabled = true;\n",
              "\n",
              "  if (!files) {\n",
              "    return {\n",
              "      response: {\n",
              "        action: 'complete',\n",
              "      }\n",
              "    };\n",
              "  }\n",
              "\n",
              "  for (const file of files) {\n",
              "    const li = document.createElement('li');\n",
              "    li.append(span(file.name, {fontWeight: 'bold'}));\n",
              "    li.append(span(\n",
              "        `(${file.type || 'n/a'}) - ${file.size} bytes, ` +\n",
              "        `last modified: ${\n",
              "            file.lastModifiedDate ? file.lastModifiedDate.toLocaleDateString() :\n",
              "                                    'n/a'} - `));\n",
              "    const percent = span('0% done');\n",
              "    li.appendChild(percent);\n",
              "\n",
              "    outputElement.appendChild(li);\n",
              "\n",
              "    const fileDataPromise = new Promise((resolve) => {\n",
              "      const reader = new FileReader();\n",
              "      reader.onload = (e) => {\n",
              "        resolve(e.target.result);\n",
              "      };\n",
              "      reader.readAsArrayBuffer(file);\n",
              "    });\n",
              "    // Wait for the data to be ready.\n",
              "    let fileData = yield {\n",
              "      promise: fileDataPromise,\n",
              "      response: {\n",
              "        action: 'continue',\n",
              "      }\n",
              "    };\n",
              "\n",
              "    // Use a chunked sending to avoid message size limits. See b/62115660.\n",
              "    let position = 0;\n",
              "    do {\n",
              "      const length = Math.min(fileData.byteLength - position, MAX_PAYLOAD_SIZE);\n",
              "      const chunk = new Uint8Array(fileData, position, length);\n",
              "      position += length;\n",
              "\n",
              "      const base64 = btoa(String.fromCharCode.apply(null, chunk));\n",
              "      yield {\n",
              "        response: {\n",
              "          action: 'append',\n",
              "          file: file.name,\n",
              "          data: base64,\n",
              "        },\n",
              "      };\n",
              "\n",
              "      let percentDone = fileData.byteLength === 0 ?\n",
              "          100 :\n",
              "          Math.round((position / fileData.byteLength) * 100);\n",
              "      percent.textContent = `${percentDone}% done`;\n",
              "\n",
              "    } while (position < fileData.byteLength);\n",
              "  }\n",
              "\n",
              "  // All done.\n",
              "  yield {\n",
              "    response: {\n",
              "      action: 'complete',\n",
              "    }\n",
              "  };\n",
              "}\n",
              "\n",
              "scope.google = scope.google || {};\n",
              "scope.google.colab = scope.google.colab || {};\n",
              "scope.google.colab._files = {\n",
              "  _uploadFiles,\n",
              "  _uploadFilesContinue,\n",
              "};\n",
              "})(self);\n",
              "</script> "
            ]
          },
          "metadata": {}
        },
        {
          "output_type": "stream",
          "name": "stdout",
          "text": [

          ]

              "      buttonEl.style.display =\n",

              "\n",
              "      async function convertToInteractive(key) {\n",
              "        const element = document.querySelector('#df-4dd7da3b-a43e-41c8-9149-28328ef2b632');\n",
              "        const dataTable =\n",
              "          await google.colab.kernel.invokeFunction('convertToInteractive',\n",
              "                                                    [key], {});\n",
              "        if (!dataTable) return;\n",
              "\n",
              "        const docLinkHtml = 'Like what you see? Visit the ' +\n",
              "          '<a target=\"_blank\" href=https://colab.research.google.com/notebooks/data_table.ipynb>data table notebook</a>'\n",
              "          + ' to learn more about interactive tables.';\n",
              "        element.innerHTML = '';\n",
              "        dataTable['output_type'] = 'display_data';\n",
              "        await google.colab.output.renderOutput(dataTable, element);\n",
              "        const docLink = document.createElement('div');\n",
              "        docLink.innerHTML = docLinkHtml;\n",
              "        element.appendChild(docLink);\n",
              "      }\n",
              "    </script>\n",
              "  </div>\n",
              "\n",
              "\n",

      "cell_type": "code",
      "source": [
        "import PyPDF2\n",
        "pdf_file = open('/content/Design Criteria Project.pdf','rb' )\n",
        "reader=PyPDF2.PdfReader(pdf_file)\n",
        "text = \"\"\n",
        "for page in reader.pages:\n",
        "  text += page.extract_text()\n",
        "print(text)\n",
        "pdf_file.close()"
      ],
      "metadata": {
        "colab": {
          "base_uri": "https://localhost:8080/"
        },
        "id": "foYYhskEeulg",
        "outputId": "9f07da16-6e66-4e62-8457-0c409ba265b4"

      "execution_count": 29,
      "outputs": [
        {
          "output_type": "stream",
          "name": "stdout",
          "text": [
            "Design Criteria Project\n",
            "Step 7: Establish Design Criteria\n",
            "Insight 1:  Users need an intuitive interface to interact with the product efficiently. Criterion 1:  The solution\n",
            "must have a user-friendly interface that requires minimal training and enables easy navigation.\n",
            "Insight 2:  Users want real-time feedback to make informed decisions.  Criterion 2:  The solution must\n",
            "provide instantaneous feedback and updates to users based on their inputs.\n",
            "Insight 3:  Security and privacy are critical for users trusting the product.  Criterion 3:  The solution must\n",
            "implement robust security measures, including data encryption and user authentication, to protect user\n",
            "information.\n",
            "Insight 4:  Users expect accessibility across multiple devices. Criterion 4:  The solution must be compatible\n",
            "with a variety of devices, including smartphones, tablets, and desktops, without loss of functionality.\n",
            "Insight 5:  Users prefer customizable features to suit their individual needs. Criterion 5:  The solution must\n",
            "offer customizable settings and features to adapt to different user preferences and workflows.\n",
            "Insight 6:  Users need reliability and minimal downtime.  Criterion 6:  The solution must maintain high\n",
            "availability, stability, and resilience to ensure continuous operation.\n",
            "Insight 7:  Integration with existing tools is important for efficiency. Criterion 7:  The solution must support\n",
            "seamless integration with commonly used software and platforms.\n",
            "Insight 8:  Users value visual clarity and organization for better comprehension. Criterion 8:  The solution\n",
            "must have clear visual hierarchy, organized layouts, and intuitive information presentation.\n",
            "Insight 9:  Users benefit from proactive assistance or guidance.  Criterion 9:  The solution must include\n",
            "intelligent prompts, tips, or help features to guide users through complex tasks.\n",
            "Insight 10:  Scalability is essential for growth and adoption. Criterion 10:  The solution must be designed to\n",
            "scale efficiently, accommodating increasing numbers of users and data without performance degradation.\n",
            "End of Design Criteria\n",
            "1\n"
          ]
        }
      ]

</ul>\\n      <ul class=\"row p-list--divided is-homepage\">\\n        <li class=\"p-list__item is-ticked col-medium-3 col-3 u-no-padding--top u-no-padding--bottom\">\\n          <p>\\n            <a href=\"https://canonical.com/solutions/open-source-security/cyber-resilience-act\">Cyber Resilience Act (CRA)</a>: Meet your CRA requirements\\n          </p>\\n        </li>\\n        <li <abbr title=\"Department of Defence, USA\">DoD</abbr>\\n            compliance\\n          </p>\\n        </li>\\n        <li class=\"p-list__item is-ticked col-medium-3 col-3 u-no-padding--top community-driven operators\\n          </p>\\n        </li>\\n      </ul>\\n\\n      <div class=\"row\">\\n        <hr class=\"p-rule--muted\" />\\n        <div class=\"col-6 col-start-large-7\">\\n          <p>\\n            <a href=\"https://juju.is\" class=\"p-button is-dark\">Learn more about universal operators</a>\\n          </p>\\n        </div>\\n      </div>\\n    </section>\\n\\n    \\n      \\n    \\n\\n    <script type=\"module\">\\n      const testTakeover = document.getElementById(\\'test-takeover\\');\\n      const mainTakeover = document.getElementById(\\'takeover\\');\\n\\n      const getCookie = () => document.cookie.match(new RegExp(\\'(^| )\\' + \"control_or_variant\" + \\'=([^;]+)\\'));\\n      // Switch for turning takeover switching on and off on demand\\n      const takeoverSwitch = false;\\n      if (!takeoverSwitch) document.cookie = \\'control_or_variant=;\\';\\n      else {\\n        // check if user doesn\\'t already have a group\\n        if (!getCookie()) {\\n          // randomly assign to \\'control\\' or \\'variant\\' group\\n          const group = Math.random() > 0.5 ?\\n            \"control\" :\\n            \"variant\";\\n\\n          // store group as cookie for 365 days\\n          document.cookie = \\'control_or_variant=\\' + group + \\';max-age=31536000;\\';\\n\\n          // send group info in GA event\\n          dataLayer.push({\\n            event: \"test\",\\n            test_type: \"element visibility\",\\n            control_or_variant: group,\\n          });\\n        }\\n      }\\n\\n      if (getCookie()?.[2] === \\'variant\\') {\\n        testTakeover.hidden = false;\\n        mainTakeover.hidden = true;\\n      } else {\\n        testTakeover.hidden = true;\\n        mainTakeover.hidden = false;\\n      }\\n\\n      // get the users language and remove any extra detail suffix (e.g. -gb)\\n      var primaryParentLanguage = getPrimaryParentLanguage();\\n\\n      // get notices matching the user language\\n      var notices = document.querySelectorAll(\".notice[lang=\" + primaryParentLanguage + \"]\");\\n\\n      // display only one matching notice\\n      if (notices.length > 0) {\\n        notices[0].classList.remove(\"u-hide\")\\n      }\\n\\n      var baseTakeover = document.getElementById(\\'takeover\\');\\n      let takeoverAnimation;\\n      if (getCookie()?.[2] === \\'variant\\') {\\n        takeoverAnimation = document.getElementById(\"test-takeover-animaition\");\\n      } else {\\n        takeoverAnimation = document.getElementById(\"takeover-animaition\");\\n      }\\n\\n      if (window.localStorage && baseTakeover) {\\n        /**\\n         * Choose a takeover\\n         * ===\\n         *\\n         * From the list of provided takeovers from /.takeovers.json,\\n         * choose one (that matches the client\\'s language), and replace the\\n         * base template with it.\\n         */\\n\\n        var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();\\n        if (window.ActiveXObject) {\\n          xhr = new ActiveXObject(\\'Microsoft.XMLHTTP\\');\\n        }\\n        var fetchUserCountry = new XMLHttpRequest();\\n        if (window.ActiveXObject) {\\n          fetchUserCountry = new ActiveXObject(\\'Microsoft.XMLHTTP\\');\\n        }\\n\\n        xhr.onreadystatechange = function() {\\n          if (xhr.readyState == XMLHttpRequest.DONE) {\\n            if (xhr.status === 200) {\\n              var takeovers = JSON.parse(xhr.responseText);\\n\\n              // Get the selected takeovers based on the primary language\\n              if (\\n                fetchUserCountry.readyState == XMLHttpRequest.DONE &&\\n                fetchUserCountry.status == 200\\n              ) {\\n                var userCountry = JSON.parse(fetchUserCountry.responseText).country_code;\\n                var selectedTakeovers = takeovers.filter(function(item) {\\n                  if (item.target_country && item.target_country == userCountry) {\\n                    return true;\\n                  } else if (item.lang === primaryParentLanguage || item.lang === \"\") {\\n                    return true;\\n                  } else {\\n                    return false;\\n                  }\\n                });\\n              } else {\\n                var selectedTakeovers = takeovers.filter(function(item) {\\n                  if (item.lang === primaryParentLanguage || item.lang === \"\") {\\n                    return true;\\n                  } else {\\n                    return false;\\n                  }\\n                });\\n              }\\n\\n              if (selectedTakeovers && selectedTakeovers.length > 0) {\\n                var selectedIndex = null;\\n\\n                if (window.localStorage.getItem(\"selected_takeover_index\") !== null) {\\n                  // If we previously visited a takeover, increment the number to show the next takeover\\n                  var nextIndex =\\n                    parseInt(window.localStorage.getItem(\"selected_takeover_index\")) + 1;\\n                  selectedIndex = nextIndex < selectedTakeovers.length ? nextIndex : 0;\\n                } else {\\n                  // Otherwise, randomly choose one of the takeovers and store it for next time\\n                  selectedIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * selectedTakeovers.length);\\n                }\\n                showTakeover(selectedTakeovers, selectedIndex);\\n\\n                // Store the current takeover index\\n                localStorage.setItem(\"selected_takeover_index\", selectedIndex);\\n              }\\n\\n\\n            } else {\\n              takeoverAnimation.className = takeoverAnimation.className.replace(\" is-loading\", \"\");\\n              takeoverAnimation.className += \" is-loaded\";\\n            }\\n          }\\n        };\\n\\n        xhr.open(\"GET\", \"/takeovers.json\", true);\\n        xhr.send();\\n\\n        const timezone = Intl.DateTimeFormat().resolvedOptions().timeZone;\\n        fetchUserCountry.open(\"GET\", `/user-country-tz.json?tz=${timezone}`, true);\\n        fetchUserCountry.send();\\n      }\\n\\n      function showTakeover(takeovers, index) {\\n        // Default parameter\\n        index = typeof index !== \\'undefined\\' ? index : 0;\\n\\n        // Get HTML elements for the correct takeover\\n        let takeover, title, subtitle, image, primaryUrl, secondaryUrl;\\n        if (getCookie()?.[2] === \\'variant\\') {\\n          takeover = document.getElementById(\"test-takeover\");\\n          title = document.getElementById(\"test-takeover-title\");\\n          subtitle = document.getElementById(\"test-takeover-subtitle\");\\n          image = document.getElementById(\"test-takeover-image\");\\n          primaryUrl = document.getElementById(\"test-takeover-primary-url\");\\n        } else {\\n          takeover = document.getElementById(\"takeover\");\\n          title = document.getElementById(\"takeover-title\");\\n          subtitle = document.getElementById(\"takeover-subtitle\");\\n          image = document.getElementById(\"takeover-image\");\\n          primaryUrl = document.getElementById(\"takeover-primary-url\");\\n          secondaryUrl = document.getElementById(\"takeover-secondary-url\");\\n        }\\n\\n        // Set values to homepage takeover\\n        var selectedTakeover = takeovers[index];\\n\\n        takeover.className = \"\";\\n        takeover.removeAttribute(\"style\");\\n\\n        // Add takeover classes\\n        var classNameString = \"js-takeover p-takeover--\" + selectedTakeover.class;\\n        takeover.className += classNameString;\\n\\n        // Set language attributes\\n        if (selectedTakeover.lang) {\\n          takeover.setAttribute(\"lang\", selectedTakeover.lang);\\n        }\\n        if (selectedTakeover.lang_skip) {\\n          takeover.setAttribute(\"lang-skip\", selectedTakeover.lang_skip);\\n        }\\n\\n        // Set takeover content\\n        if (title.textContent.length > 80 || subtitle.textContent.length > 80) {\\n          title.classList.remove(\"u-no-margin--bottom\")\\n          subtitle.classList.remove(\"p-heading--2\")\\n        }\\n\\n        title.textContent = selectedTakeover.title;\\n        subtitle.textContent = selectedTakeover.subtitle;\\n\\n        image.src = selectedTakeover.image;\\n        image.srcset = selectedTakeover.image;\\n\\n        image.onload = function() {\\n          // Remove animation delay\\n          if (takeoverAnimation) {\\n            takeoverAnimation.className = takeoverAnimation.className.replace(\" is-loading\", \"\");\\n            takeoverAnimation.className += \" is-loaded\";\\n          }\\n        }\\n\\n        if (image.getAttribute(\"src\") === \"\") {\\n          takeoverAnimation.className = takeoverAnimation.className.replace(\" is-loading\", \"\");\\n          takeoverAnimation.className += \" is-loaded\";\\n        }\\n\\n        image.removeAttribute(\"style\");\\n        image.width = selectedTakeover.image_width;\\n        image.height = selectedTakeover.image_height;\\n\\n        if (selectedTakeover.primary_url && selectedTakeover.primary_cta) {\\n          primaryUrl.href = selectedTakeover.primary_url;\\n          primaryUrl.textContent = selectedTakeover.primary_cta;\\n        } else {\\n          primaryUrl.remove();\\n        }\\n\\n        if (secondaryUrl && selectedTakeover.secondary_url && selectedTakeover.secondary_url !== \"\") {\\n          secondaryUrl.href = selectedTakeover.secondary_url;\\n          secondaryUrl.innerHTML = selectedTakeover.secondary_cta + \"&nbsp;&rsaquo;\";\\n        } else {\\n          secondaryUrl?.remove();\\n        }\\n\\n        dataLayer.push({\\n          event: \"NonInteractiveGAEvent\",\\n          eventCategory: \"www.ubuntu.com-impression-takeover\",\\n          eventAction: \"from:\" + window.location.href + \" to:\" + selectedTakeover.primary_url,\\n          eventLabel: selectedTakeover.primary_cta,\\n          eventValue: undefined,\\n        });\\n      }\\n    </script>\\n\\n    <!-- Set default Marketo information for contact form below-->\\n    <div class=\"u-hide\"\\n         id=\"contact-form-container\"\\n         data-form-location=\"/shared/forms/interactive/general\"\\n         data-form-id=\"1257\"\\n         data-lp-id=\"2154\"\\n         data-return-url=\"https://ubuntu.com/contact-us/thank-you\"\\n         data-lp-url=\"https://pages.ubuntu.com/things-contact-us.html\"></div>\\n\\n  \\n\\n              \\n            </main>\\n          </div>\\n\\n          <!-- footer content goes here -->\\n id=\"main-navigation\"\\n         class=\"p-footer__nav p-section\">\\n      \\n        <div class=\"row\">\\n  <hr class=\"p-rule--muted u-no-margin--bottom\" />\\n  <div class=\"col-3 col-medium-2\">\\n    <h2 class=\"p-heading--5\">\\n      <a class=\"u-hide--small\" href=\"/openstack\">\\n        \\n          OpenStack\\n        \\n      </a>\\n      <a class=\"u-hide--medium        <p>\\n            <a href=\"https://juju.is\" class=\"p-button is-dark\">Learn more about universal operators</a>\\n          </p>\\n        </div>\\n      </div>\\n    </section>\\n\\n    \\n      \\n    \\n\\n    <script type=\"module\">\\n      const testTakeover = document.getElementById(\\'test-takeover\\');\\n      const mainTakeover = document.getElementById(\\'takeover\\');\\n\\n      const getCookie = () => document.cookie.match(new RegExp(\\'(^| )\\' + \"control_or_variant\" + \\'=([^;]+)\\'));\\n      // Switch for turning takeover switching on and off on demand\\n      const takeoverSwitch = false;\\n      if (!takeoverSwitch) document.cookie = \\'control_or_variant=;\\';\\n      else {\\n        // check if user doesn\\'t already have a group\\n        if (!getCookie()) {\\n          // randomly assign to \\'control\\' or \\'variant\\' group\\n          const group = Math.random() > 0.5 ?\\n            \"control\" :\\n            \"variant\";\\n\\n          // store group as cookie for 365 days\\n          document.cookie = \\'control_or_variant=\\' + group + \\';max-age=31536000;\\';\\n\\n          // send group info in GA event\\n          dataLayer.push({\\n            event: \"test\",\\n            test_type: \"element visibility\",\\n            control_or_variant: group,\\n          });\\n        }\\n      }\\n\\n      if (getCookie()?.[2] === \\'variant\\') {\\n        testTakeover.hidden = false;\\n        mainTakeover.hidden = true;\\n      } else {\\n        testTakeover.hidden = true;\\n        mainTakeover.hidden = false;\\n      }\\n\\n      // get the users language and remove any extra detail suffix (e.g. -gb)\\n      var primaryParentLanguage = getPrimaryParentLanguage();\\n\\n      // get notices matching the user language\\n      var notices = document.querySelectorAll(\".notice[lang=\" + primaryParentLanguage + \"]\");\\n\\n      // display only one matching notice\\n      if (notices.length > 0) {\\n        notices[0].classList.remove(\"u-hide\")\\n      }\\n\\n      var baseTakeover = document.getElementById(\\'takeover\\');\\n      let takeoverAnimation;\\n      if (getCookie()?.[2] === \\'variant\\') {\\n        takeoverAnimation = document.getElementById(\"test-takeover-animaition\");\\n      } else {\\n        takeoverAnimation = document.getElementById(\"takeover-animaition\");\\n      }\\n\\n      if (window.localStorage && baseTakeover) {\\n        /**\\n         * Choose a takeover\\n         * ===\\n         *\\n         * From the list of provided takeovers from /.takeovers.json,\\n         * choose one (that matches the client\\'s language), and replace the\\n         * base template with it.\\n         */\\n\\n        var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();\\n        if (window.ActiveXObject) {\\n          xhr = new ActiveXObject(\\'Microsoft.XMLHTTP\\');\\n        }\\n        var fetchUserCountry = new XMLHttpRequest();\\n        if (window.ActiveXObject) {\\n          fetchUserCountry = new ActiveXObject(\\'Microsoft.XMLHTTP\\');\\n        }\\n\\n        xhr.onreadystatechange = function() {\\n          if (xhr.readyState == XMLHttpRequest.DONE) {\\n            if (xhr.status === 200) {\\n              var takeovers = JSON.parse(xhr.responseText);\\n\\n              // Get the selected takeovers based on the primary language\\n              if (\\n                fetchUserCountry.readyState == XMLHttpRequest.DONE &&\\n                fetchUserCountry.status == 200\\n              ) {\\n                var userCountry = JSON.parse(fetchUserCountry.responseText).country_code;\\n                var selectedTakeovers = takeovers.filter(function(item) {\\n                  if (item.target_country && item.target_country == userCountry) {\\n                    return true;\\n                  } else if (item.lang === primaryParentLanguage || item.lang === \"\") {\\n                    return true;\\n                  } else {\\n                    return false;\\n                  }\\n                });\\n              } else {\\n                var selectedTakeovers = takeovers.filter(function(item) {\\n                  if (item.lang === primaryParentLanguage || item.lang === \"\") {\\n                    return true;\\n                  } else {\\n                    return false;\\n                  }\\n                });\\n              }\\n\\n              if (selectedTakeovers && selectedTakeovers.length > 0) {\\n                var selectedIndex = null;\\n\\n                if (window.localStorage.getItem(\"selected_takeover_index\") !== null) {\\n                  // If we previously visited a takeover, increment the number to show the next takeover\\n                  var nextIndex =\\n                    parseInt(window.localStorage.getItem(\"selected_takeover_index\")) + 1;\\n                  selectedIndex = nextIndex < selectedTakeovers.length ? nextIndex : 0;\\n                } else {\\n                  // Otherwise, randomly choose one of the takeovers and store it for next time\\n                  selectedIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * selectedTakeovers.length);\\n                }\\n                showTakeover(selectedTakeovers, selectedIndex);\\n\\n                // Store the current takeover index\\n                localStorage.setItem(\"selected_takeover_index\", selectedIndex);\\n              }\\n\\n\\n            } else {\\n              takeoverAnimation.className = takeoverAnimation.className.replace(\" is-loading\", \"\");\\n              takeoverAnimation.className += \" is-loaded\";\\n            }\\n          }\\n        };\\n\\n        xhr.open(\"GET\", \"/takeovers.json\", true);\\n        xhr.send();\\n\\n        const timezone = Intl.DateTimeFormat().resolvedOptions().timeZone;\\n        fetchUserCountry.open(\"GET\", `/user-country-tz.json?tz=${timezone}`, true);\\n        fetchUserCountry.send();\\n      }\\n\\n      function showTakeover(takeovers, index) {\\n        // Default parameter\\n        index = typeof index !== \\'undefined\\' ? index : 0;\\n\\n        // Get HTML elements for the correct takeover\\n        let takeover, title, subtitle, image, primaryUrl, secondaryUrl;\\n        if (getCookie()?.[2] === \\'variant\\') {\\n          takeover = document.getElementById(\"test-takeover\");\\n          title = document.getElementById(\"test-takeover-title\");\\n          subtitle = document.getElementById(\"test-takeover-subtitle\");\\n          image = document.getElementById(\"test-takeover-image\");\\n          primaryUrl = document.getElementById(\"test-takeover-primary-url\");\\n        } else {\\n          takeover = document.getElementById(\"takeover\");\\n          title = document.getElementById(\"takeover-title\");\\n          subtitle = document.getElementById(\"takeover-subtitle\");\\n          image = document.getElementById(\"takeover-image\");\\n          primaryUrl = document.getElementById(\"takeover-primary-url\");\\n          secondaryUrl = document.getElementById(\"takeover-secondary-url\");\\n        }\\n\\n        // Set values to homepage takeover\\n        var selectedTakeover = takeovers[index];\\n\\n        takeover.className = \"\";\\n        takeover.removeAttribute(\"style\");\\n\\n        // Add takeover classes\\n        var classNameString = \"js-takeover p-takeover--\" + selectedTakeover.class;\\n        takeover.className += classNameString;\\n\\n        // Set language attributes\\n        if (selectedTakeover.lang) {\\n          takeover.setAttribute(\"lang\", selectedTakeover.lang);\\n        }\\n        if (selectedTakeover.lang_skip) {\\n          takeover.setAttribute(\"lang-skip\", selectedTakeover.lang_skip);\\n        }\\n\\n        // Set takeover content\\n        if (title.textContent.length > 80 || subtitle.textContent.length > 80) {\\n          title.classList.remove(\"u-no-margin--bottom\")\\n          subtitle.classList.remove(\"p-heading--2\")\\n        }\\n\\n        title.textContent = selectedTakeover.title;\\n        subtitle.textContent = selectedTakeover.subtitle;\\n\\n        image.src = selectedTakeover.image;\\n        image.srcset = selectedTakeover.image;\\n\\n        image.onload = function() {\\n          // Remove animation delay\\n          if (takeoverAnimation) {\\n            takeoverAnimation.className = takeoverAnimation.className.replace(\" is-loading\", \"\");\\n            takeoverAnimation.className += \" is-loaded\";\\n          }\\n        }\\n\\n        if (image.getAttribute(\"src\") === \"\") {\\n          takeoverAnimation.className = takeoverAnimation.className.replace(\" is-loading\", \"\");\\n          takeoverAnimation.className += \" is-loaded\";\\n        }\\n\\n        image.removeAttribute(\"style\");\\n        image.width = selectedTakeover.image_width;\\n        image.height = selectedTakeover.image_height;\\n\\n        if (selectedTakeover.primary_url && selectedTakeover.primary_cta) {\\n          primaryUrl.href = selectedTakeover.primary_url;\\n          primaryUrl.textContent = selectedTakeover.primary_cta;\\n        } else {\\n          primaryUrl.remove();\\n        }\\n\\n        if (secondaryUrl && selectedTakeover.secondary_url && selectedTakeover.secondary_url !== \"\") {\\n          secondaryUrl.href = selectedTakeover.secondary_url;\\n          secondaryUrl.innerHTML = selectedTakeover.secondary_cta + \"&nbsp;&rsaquo;\";\\n        } else {\\n          secondaryUrl?.remove();\\n        }\\n\\n        dataLayer.push({\\n          event: \"NonInteractiveGAEvent\",\\n          eventCategory: \"www.ubuntu.com-impression-takeover\",\\n          eventAction: \"from:\" + window.location.href + \" to:\" + selectedTakeover.primary_url,\\n          eventLabel: selectedTakeover.primary_cta,\\n          eventValue: undefined,\\n        });\\n      }\\n    </script>\\n\\n    <!-- Set default Marketo information for contact form below-->\\n    <div class=\"u-hide\"\\n         id=\"contact-form-container\"\\n         data-form-location=\"/shared/forms/interactive/general\"\\n         data-form-id=\"1257\"\\n         data-lp-id=\"2154\"\\n         data-return-url=\"https://ubuntu.com/contact-us/thank-you\"\\n         data-lp-url=\"https://pages.ubuntu.com/things-contact-us.html\"></div>\\n\\n  \\n\\n              \\n            </main>\\n          </div>\\n\\n          <!-- footer content goes here -->\\n               "        };\n",
              "        e.l && l()\n",
              "      }()), n[e].lv = \"1\", n[e]\n",
              "    }\n",
              "    var r = window.lightningjs = t(e);\n",
              "    r.require = t, r.modules = n\n",
              "  }({});\n",
              "  window.usabilla_live = lightningjs.require(\"usabilla_live\", \"//w.usabilla.com/ecdf1756070a.js\");\n",
              "</script>\n",
              "<!-- end usabilla live embed code -->\n",
              "<div class=\"p-popup-notification\" id=\"success\">\n",
              "<div class=\"p-notification--positive u-no-margin--bottom\">\n",

              "</section>\n",

              "<div class=\"row--50-50-on-large p-section--shallow\">\n",
              "<hr class=\"p-rule\"/>\n",
              "<div class=\"col\">\n",
              "<h2 class=\"p-heading--1 u-no-margin--bottom u-no-max-width\">Multi-cloud Kubernetes and containers</h2>\n",
              "<p class=\"p-heading--2\">\n",
              "<a href=\"https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/services/kubernetes-service/\" title=\"external link - azure.microsoft.com/en-us/services/kubernetes-service\">AKS.</a> <a href=\"https://cloud-images.ubuntu.com/docs/aws/eks/\" title=\"external link - cloud-images.ubuntu.com/docs/aws/eks\">EKS.</a> <a href=\"https://cloud.google.com/kubernetes-engine\" title=\"external link - cloud.google.com/kubernetes-engine\">GKE.</a> Kubeadm. <a href=\"https://microk8s.io\" title=\"external link - microk8s.io\">MicroK8s.</a> <a href=\"/kubernetes/features\">Charmed Kubernetes.</a>\n",
              "</p>\n",
              "<p class=\"p-heading--2\">All on Ubuntu.</p>\n",
              "<div class=\"p-section--shallow\">\n",
              "<div class=\"p-logo-section--dense\">\n",
              "<div class=\"p-logo-section__items landing-logos u-no-padding\">\n",
              "<div class=\"p-logo-section__item\">\n",

              "</p>\n",

              "</div>\n",
              "</section>\n",
              "<script type=\"module\">\n",
              "      const testTakeover = document.getElementById('test-takeover');\n",
              "      const mainTakeover = document.getElementById('takeover');\n",
              "\n",
              "      const getCookie = () => document.cookie.match(new RegExp('(^| )' + \"control_or_variant\" + '=([^;]+)'));\n",
              "      // Switch for turning takeover switching on and off on demand\n",
              "      const takeoverSwitch = false;\n",
              "      if (!takeoverSwitch) document.cookie = 'control_or_variant=;';\n",
              "      else {\n",
              "        // check if user doesn't already have a group\n",
              "        if (!getCookie()) {\n",
              "          // randomly assign to 'control' or 'variant' group\n",
              "          const group = Math.random() > 0.5 ?\n",
              "            \"control\" :\n",
              "            \"variant\";\n",
              "\n",
              "          // store group as cookie for 365 days\n",
              "          document.cookie = 'control_or_variant=' + group + ';max-age=31536000;';\n",
              "\n",
              "          // send group info in GA event\n",
              "          dataLayer.push({\n",
              "            event: \"test\",\n",
              "            test_type: \"element visibility\",\n",
              "            control_or_variant: group,\n",
              "          });\n",
              "        }\n",
              "      }\n",
              "\n",
              "      if (getCookie()?.[2] === 'variant') {\n",
              "        testTakeover.hidden = false;\n",
              "        mainTakeover.hidden = true;\n",
              "      } else {\n",
              "        testTakeover.hidden = true;\n",
              "        mainTakeover.hidden = false;\n",
              "      }\n",
              "\n",
              "      // get the users language and remove any extra detail suffix (e.g. -gb)\n",
              "      var primaryParentLanguage = getPrimaryParentLanguage();\n",
              "\n",
              "      // get notices matching the user language\n",
              "      var notices = document.querySelectorAll(\".notice[lang=\" + primaryParentLanguage + \"]\");\n",
              "\n",
              "      // display only one matching notice\n",
              "      if (notices.length > 0) {\n",
              "        notices[0].classList.remove(\"u-hide\")\n",
              "      }\n",
              "\n",
              "      var baseTakeover = document.getElementById('takeover');\n",
              "      let takeoverAnimation;\n",
              "      if (getCookie()?.[2] === 'variant') {\n",
              "        takeoverAnimation = document.getElementById(\"test-takeover-animaition\");\n",
              "      } else {\n",
              "        takeoverAnimation = document.getElementById(\"takeover-animaition\");\n",
              "      }\n",
              "\n",
              "      if (window.localStorage && baseTakeover) {\n",
              "        /**\n",
              "         * Choose a takeover\n",
              "         * ===\n",
              "         *\n",
              "         * From the list of provided takeovers from /.takeovers.json,\n",
              "         * choose one (that matches the client's language), and replace the\n",
              "         * base template with it.\n",
              "         */\n",
              "\n",
              "        var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();\n",
              "        if (window.ActiveXObject) {\n",
              "          xhr = new ActiveXObject('Microsoft.XMLHTTP');\n",
              "        }\n",
              "        var fetchUserCountry = new XMLHttpRequest();\n",
              "        if (window.ActiveXObject) {\n",
              "          fetchUserCountry = new ActiveXObject('Microsoft.XMLHTTP');\n",
              "        }\n",
              "\n",
              "        xhr.onreadystatechange = function() {\n",
              "          if (xhr.readyState == XMLHttpRequest.DONE) {\n",
              "            if (xhr.status === 200) {\n",
              "              var takeovers = JSON.parse(xhr.responseText);\n",
              "\n",
              "              // Get the selected takeovers based on the primary language\n",
              "              if (\n",
              "                fetchUserCountry.readyState == XMLHttpRequest.DONE &&\n",
              "                fetchUserCountry.status == 200\n",
              "              ) {\n",
              "                var userCountry = JSON.parse(fetchUserCountry.responseText).country_code;\n",
              "                var selectedTakeovers = takeovers.filter(function(item) {\n",
              "                  if (item.target_country && item.target_country == userCountry) {\n",
              "                    return true;\n",
              "                  } else if (item.lang === primaryParentLanguage || item.lang === \"\") {\n",
              "                    return true;\n",
              "                  } else {\n",
              "                    return false;\n",
              "                  }\n",
              "                });\n",
              "              } else {\n",
              "                var selectedTakeovers = takeovers.filter(function(item) {\n",
              "                  if (item.lang === primaryParentLanguage || item.lang === \"\") {\n",
              "                    return true;\n",
              "                  } else {\n",
              "                    return false;\n",
              "                  }\n",
              "                });\n",
              "              }\n",
              "\n",
              "              if (selectedTakeovers && selectedTakeovers.length > 0) {\n",
              "                var selectedIndex = null;\n",
              "\n",
              "                if (window.localStorage.getItem(\"selected_takeover_index\") !== null) {\n",
              "                  // If we previously visited a takeover, increment the number to show the next takeover\n",
              "                  var nextIndex =\n",
              "                    parseInt(window.localStorage.getItem(\"selected_takeover_index\")) + 1;\n",
              "                  selectedIndex = nextIndex < selectedTakeovers.length ? nextIndex : 0;\n",
              "                } else {\n",
              "                  // Otherwise, randomly choose one of the takeovers and store it for next time\n",
              "                  selectedIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * selectedTakeovers.length);\n",
              "                }\n",
              "                showTakeover(selectedTakeovers, selectedIndex);\n",
              "\n",
              "                // Store the current takeover index\n",
              "                localStorage.setItem(\"selected_takeover_index\", selectedIndex);\n",
              "              }\n",
              "\n",
              "\n",
              "            } else {\n",
              "              takeoverAnimation.className = takeoverAnimation.className.replace(\" is-loading\", \"\");\n",
              "              takeoverAnimation.className += \" is-loaded\";\n",
              "            }\n",
              "          }\n",
              "        };\n",
              "\n",
              "        xhr.open(\"GET\", \"/takeovers.json\", true);\n",
              "        xhr.send();\n",
              "\n",
              "        const timezone = Intl.DateTimeFormat().resolvedOptions().timeZone;\n",
              "        fetchUserCountry.open(\"GET\", `/user-country-tz.json?tz=${timezone}`, true);\n",
              "        fetchUserCountry.send();\n",
              "      }\n",
              "\n",
              "      function showTakeover(takeovers, index) {\n",
              "        // Default parameter\n",
              "        index = typeof index !== 'undefined' ? index : 0;\n",
              "\n",
              "        // Get HTML elements for the correct takeover\n",
              "        let takeover, title, subtitle, image, primaryUrl, secondaryUrl;\n",
              "        if (getCookie()?.[2] === 'variant') {\n",
              "          takeover = document.getElementById(\"test-takeover\");\n",
              "          title = document.getElementById(\"test-takeover-title\");\n",
              "          subtitle = document.getElementById(\"test-takeover-subtitle\");\n",
              "          image = document.getElementById(\"test-takeover-image\");\n",
              "          primaryUrl = document.getElementById(\"test-takeover-primary-url\");\n",
              "        } else {\n",
              "          takeover = document.getElementById(\"takeover\");\n",
              "          title = document.getElementById(\"takeover-title\");\n",
              "          subtitle = document.getElementById(\"takeover-subtitle\");\n",
              "          image = document.getElementById(\"takeover-image\");\n",
              "          primaryUrl = document.getElementById(\"takeover-primary-url\");\n",
              "          secondaryUrl = document.getElementById(\"takeover-secondary-url\");\n",
              "        }\n",
              "\n",
              "        // Set values to homepage takeover\n",
              "        var selectedTakeover = takeovers[index];\n",
              "\n",
              "        takeover.className = \"\";\n",
              "        takeover.removeAttribute(\"style\");\n",
              "\n",
              "        // Add takeover classes\n",
              "        var classNameString = \"js-takeover p-takeover--\" + selectedTakeover.class;\n",
              "        takeover.className += classNameString;\n",
              "\n",
              "        // Set language attributes\n",
              "        if (selectedTakeover.lang) {\n",
              "          takeover.setAttribute(\"lang\", selectedTakeover.lang);\n",
              "        }\n",
              "        if (selectedTakeover.lang_skip) {\n",
              "          takeover.setAttribute(\"lang-skip\", selectedTakeover.lang_skip);\n",
              "        }\n",
              "\n",
              "        // Set takeover content\n",
              "        if (title.textContent.length > 80 || subtitle.textContent.length > 80) {\n",
              "          title.classList.remove(\"u-no-margin--bottom\")\n",
              "          subtitle.classList.remove(\"p-heading--2\")\n",
              "        }\n",
              "\n",
              "        title.textContent = selectedTakeover.title;\n",
              "        subtitle.textContent = selectedTakeover.subtitle;\n",
              "\n",
              "        image.src = selectedTakeover.image;\n",
              "        image.srcset = selectedTakeover.image;\n",
              "\n",
              "        image.onload = function() {\n",
              "          // Remove animation delay\n",
              "          if (takeoverAnimation) {\n",
              "            takeoverAnimation.className = takeoverAnimation.className.replace(\" is-loading\", \"\");\n",
              "            takeoverAnimation.className += \" is-loaded\";\n",
              "          }\n",
              "        }\n",
              "\n",
              "        if (image.getAttribute(\"src\") === \"\") {\n",
              "          takeoverAnimation.className = takeoverAnimation.className.replace(\" is-loading\", \"\");\n",
              "          takeoverAnimation.className += \" is-loaded\";\n",
              "        }\n",
              "\n",
              "        image.removeAttribute(\"style\");\n",
              "        image.width = selectedTakeover.image_width;\n",
              "        image.height = selectedTakeover.image_height;\n",
              "\n",
              "        if (selectedTakeover.primary_url && selectedTakeover.primary_cta) {\n",
              "          primaryUrl.href = selectedTakeover.primary_url;\n",
              "          primaryUrl.textContent = selectedTakeover.primary_cta;\n",
              "        } else {\n",
              "          primaryUrl.remove();\n",
              "        }\n",
              "\n",
              "        if (secondaryUrl && selectedTakeover.secondary_url && selectedTakeover.secondary_url !== \"\") {\n",
              "          secondaryUrl.href = selectedTakeover.secondary_url;\n",
              "          secondaryUrl.innerHTML = selectedTakeover.secondary_cta + \"&nbsp;&rsaquo;\";\n",
              "        } else {\n",
              "          secondaryUrl?.remove();\n",
              "        }\n",
              "\n",
              "        dataLayer.push({\n",
              "          event: \"NonInteractiveGAEvent\",\n",
              "          eventCategory: \"www.ubuntu.com-impression-takeover\",\n",
              "          eventAction: \"from:\" + window.location.href + \" to:\" + selectedTakeover.primary_url,\n",
              "          eventLabel: selectedTakeover.primary_cta,\n",
              "          eventValue: undefined,\n",
              "        });\n",
              "      }\n",
              "    </script>\n",
              "<!-- Set default Marketo information for contact form below-->\n",
              "<div class=\"u-hide\" data-form-id=\"1257\" data-form-location=\"/shared/forms/interactive/general\" data-lp-id=\"2154\" data-lp-url=\"https://pages.ubuntu.com/things-contact-us.html\" data-return-url=\"https://ubuntu.com/contact-us/thank-you\" id=\"contact-form-container\"></div>\n",
              "</main>\n",
              "</div>\n",
              "<!-- footer content goes here -->\n",
              "<footer class=\"is-dark p-strip u-clearfix\" style=\"background-color: #2d2d2d;\">\n",
              "<nav aria-label=\"Footer navigation\" class=\"p-footer__nav p-section\" id=\"main-navigation\">\n",
              "<div class=\"row\">\n",
              "<hr class=\"p-rule--muted u-no-margin--bottom\"/>\n",
              "<div class=\"col-3 col-medium-2\">\n",
              "<h2 class=\"p-heading--5\">\n",
              "<a class=\"u-hide--small\" href=\"/openstack\">\n",
              "        \n",
              "          OpenStack\n",
              "        \n",
              "      </a>\n",
              "<a aria-controls=\"/openstack-footer-nav\" class=\"u-hide--medium u-hide--large\" href=\"/openstack\">        \n",
              "        \n",
              "          OpenStack\n",
              "        \n",
              "      </a>\n",
              "</h2>\n",
              "</div>\n",
              "<div class=\"col-9 col-medium-4 u-hide--small\">\n",
              "<ul class=\"p-inline-list p-footer-list\" id=\"/openstack-footer-nav\">\n",
              "<li class=\"p-inline-list__item\"><a href=\"/openstack/what-is-openstack\">What is OpenStack</a></li>\n",

              "<li class=\"p-inline-list__item\"><a href=\"/cloud/cloud-computing\">What is cloud computing</a></li>\n",
              "<li class=\"p-inline-list__item\"><a href=\"/cloud/private-cloud\">What is private cloud</a></li>\n",
              "<li class=\"p-inline-list__item\"><a href=\"/cloud/hybrid-cloud\">What is hybrid cloud</a></li>\n",
              "<li class=\"p-inline-list__item\"><a href=\"/cloud/multi-cloud\">What is multi-cloud</a></li>\n",
              "<li class=\"p-inline-list__item\"><a href=\"/cloud/public-cloud\">Public cloud</a></li>\n",
              "</ul>\n",
              "</div>\n",
              "</div>\n",

              "    initGTM();\n",
              "    event.currentTarget.removeEventListener(event.type, initGTMOnEvent); // remove the event listener that got triggered\n",

              "    if (window.gtmDidInit) {\n",
              "      return false;\n",
              "    }\n",
